about.title: About Us
about.text: At Valores Sinaí, our mission is to positively impact communities through inclusive, sustainable projects. We believe solidarity drives change, and we innovate to build environments where everyone can thrive. Our focus lies in creating opportunities and supporting social development, fostering a culture of collaboration and mutual care among all members of society.
about.text1: To uphold social dignity and human well‑being through unity, concrete action, and the commitment of every individual.
about.text2: We envision a future where everyone has access to the resources and opportunities needed to enhance their quality of life.

donation.title: Take Action Now to Make a Difference!
donation.text: Our mission is to transform communities through solidarity and mutual support.

community.title: Valores Sinaí
community.subtitle: A space for community growth and engagement
community.text: At Valores Sinaí, we work together to build a strong, thriving community. Our programs focus on initiatives and venues that promote development and participation. Here, every action matters and every voice counts.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: We’re here to help. If you’d like information about our programs and services, feel free to reach out:
contact.text3: Avenida Juan Domingo Perón 3251 Pres. Derqui

who_we_are.title: Nuestros principios fundamentales
who_we_are.description: En Valores Sinai, estamos guiados por principios claros que orientan nuestro quehacer. Nuestra labor se centra en implementar estrategias, programas, iniciativas educativas y culturales que impulsen el crecimiento comunitario.

vision.title: Visión
vision.description: Ser un referente de transformación social.

values.title: Valores
values.description: Integridad, Transparencia, Excelencia, Confianza, Esfuerzo, Respeto, Honor, Bondad, Paz, Integridad, Solidaridad y Compromiso.
